thread.title: Pratap keshari parida
thread.title_full: Hoverwatch reviewed by Pratap keshari parida

author: Pratap keshari parida
title: Pratap keshari parida
text: Amazing spy app,very easy to install on target device,i installed it in targeted unrooted device and gets details of old phonebook contact as well as new number when added,notes,sim card changes,sms,call details and recording with right time stamp ,root the target device to get more details like messenger,whtsapp chat ,geo location , screenshot and other features,on request they extended my validity for some time , customer support team is very helpful,Try this awesome app (pratap keshari parida ,orissa,india)
